title: How to Make a Temporary Personal Nameplate for an Office Desk or Computer

steps.title: Create a new Word document.
steps.content: Create a new Word document. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Skip 5 lines, by pressing the Enter key.
steps.content: Skip 5 lines, by pressing the Enter key.

steps.title: Create the WordArt you'll need.
steps.content: Create the WordArt you'll need. The WordArt you'll need to type is your name. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Rotate this WordArt image
steps.content: Rotate this WordArt image 180 degrees. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Create an identical piece of WordArt (to be seen from any person standing in back of you).
steps.content: Create an identical piece of WordArt (to be seen from any person standing in back of you). Do not rotate this WordArt however. Try to equalize the amount of space in the middle of your document with just empty space.

steps.title: Save your work.
steps.content: Save your work. [4] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Print your 1-page document.
steps.content: Print your 1-page document. [5] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Fold your document down the middle.
steps.content: Fold your document down the middle.

steps.title: Open the document up, and fold both of the sides of the document to the middle fold.
steps.content: Open the document up, and fold both of the sides of the document to the middle fold.

steps.title: Pick up the document, by pinching the middle fold.
steps.content: Pick up the document, by pinching the middle fold.

steps.title: Straighten out the bottom edges, so they can allow the nameplate to stand up by its own.
steps.content: Straighten out the bottom edges, so they can allow the nameplate to stand up by its own.

steps.title: Tape the bottom two sides together on both sides (optional), to create better stability.
steps.content: Tape the bottom two sides together on both sides (optional), to create better stability.
